verses.verse: And thou, son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8798><s%> thee a sharp <S%H2299><s%> knife <S%H2719><s%>, take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee a barber's <S%H1532><s%> razor <S%H8593><s%>, and cause it to pass <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon thine head <S%H7218><s%> and upon thy beard <S%H2206><s%>: then take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee balances <S%H3976><s%> to weigh <S%H4948><s%>, and divide <S%H2505><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the hair.

Thou shalt burn <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8686><s%> with fire <S%H217><s%> a third part <S%H7992><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, when the days <S%H3117><s%> of the siege <S%H4692><s%> are fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: and thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a third part <S%H7992><s%>, and smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> about <S%H5439><s%> it with a knife <S%H2719><s%>: and a third part <S%H7992><s%> thou shalt scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the wind <S%H7307><s%>; and I will draw out <S%H7324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them.
Thou shalt also take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thereof a few <S%H4592><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%>, and bind <S%H6696><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them in thy skirts <S%H3671><s%>.

Then take of them again <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the fire <S%H784><s%>, and burn <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them in the fire <S%H784><s%>; for thereof shall a fire <S%H784><s%> come forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; This is Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>: I have set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> and countries <S%H776><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> her.

And she hath changed <S%H4784><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> into wickedness <S%H7564><s%> more than the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and my statutes <S%H2708><s%> more than the countries <S%H776><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> her: for they have refused <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%> and my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, they have not walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in them.

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Because ye multiplied <S%H1995><s%> <S%H8800><s%> more than the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> you, and have not walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, neither have kept <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, neither have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> according to the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> you;

Therefore thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Behold, I, even I, am against thee, and will execute <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> judgments <S%H4941><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>.

And I will do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thee that which I have not done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and whereunto I will not do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any more the like, because <S%H3282><s%> of all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

Therefore the fathers <S%H1><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee, and the sons <S%H1121><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>; and I will execute <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in thee, and the whole remnant <S%H7611><s%> of thee will I scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8765><s%> into all the winds <S%H7307><s%>.

Wherefore, as I live <S%H2416><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>; Surely, because thou hast defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8765><s%> my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> with all thy detestable things <S%H8251><s%>, and with all thine abominations <S%H8441><s%>, therefore will I also diminish <S%H1639><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee; neither shall mine eye <S%H5869><s%> spare <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither will I have any pity <S%H2550><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

A third part <S%H7992><s%> of thee shall die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, and with famine <S%H7458><s%> shall they be consumed <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee: and a third part <S%H7992><s%> shall fall <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> thee; and I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a third part <S%H7992><s%> into all the winds <S%H7307><s%>, and I will draw out <S%H7324><s%> <S%H8686><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them.

Thus shall mine anger <S%H639><s%> be accomplished <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and I will cause my fury <S%H2534><s%> to rest <S%H5117><s%> <S%H8689><s%> upon them, and I will be comforted <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8694><s%>: and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it in my zeal <S%H7068><s%>, when I have accomplished <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8763><s%> my fury <S%H2534><s%> in them.

Moreover I will make <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee waste <S%H2723><s%>, and a reproach <S%H2781><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> thee, in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all that pass by <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

So it shall be a reproach <S%H2781><s%> and a taunt <S%H1422><s%>, an instruction <S%H4148><s%> and an astonishment <S%H4923><s%> unto the nations <S%H1471><s%> that are round about <S%H5439><s%> thee, when I shall execute <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> judgments <S%H8201><s%> in thee in anger <S%H639><s%> and in fury <S%H2534><s%> and in furious <S%H2534><s%> rebukes <S%H8433><s%>. I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it.

When I shall send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> upon them the evil <S%H7451><s%> arrows <S%H2671><s%> of famine <S%H7458><s%>, which shall be for their destruction <S%H4889><s%>, and which I will send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8763><s%> to destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8763><s%> you: and I will increase <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the famine <S%H7458><s%> upon you, and will break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8804><s%> your staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>:

So will I send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8765><s%> upon you famine <S%H7458><s%> and evil <S%H7451><s%> beasts <S%H2416><s%>, and they shall bereave <S%H7921><s%> <S%H8765><s%> thee; and pestilence <S%H1698><s%> and blood <S%H1818><s%> shall pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thee; and I will bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> upon thee. I the YY <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> it.
